articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: DNC will recommend nixing Iowa's 'virtual caucus' plans over hacking fears
articles.description: The Democratic National Committee will be working to reject plans for a "virtual caucus" in Iowa over fears that the process could be hacked. NBC's Maura Barrett has more details.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Florida residents prepare for worst as Hurricane Dorian approaches
articles.description: As Hurricane Dorian continues its approach toward Florida, residents are heading to retailers and hardware stores in preparation for the storm. MSNBC's Mariana Atencio and Morgan Chesky are in the Sunshine State getting updates and reactions from locals.

articles.title: Legal expert: Inspector general has the 'obligation to shut up...

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Joe Biden tells false war story on campaign trail
articles.description: A  recent Washington Post report claims that details of a moving war story former VP Joe Biden told during a campaign event in New Hampshire last week never actually happened. Biden defended himself to the Post, saying he was making the point of how courageou…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Not surprised but disappointed: Senator denied Russian visa
articles.description: Sen. Chris Murphy, D-Conn., is one of the U.S. lawmakers denied a visa to visit Moscow next week amid debate over whether Russia should be re-admitted to the G7. Sen. Murphy joins Morning Joe to share his reaction to being denied.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Biden gets facts wrong in war story, but will it hurt him?
articles.description: 2020 candidate, former VP Joe Biden has frequently jumbled the details of a dramatic story from one of his many visits to U.S. soldiers in Afghanistan, according to Washington Post reporting. The panel discusses.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump's personal assistant abruptly resigns
articles.description: President Trump's personal assistant Madeleine Westerhout resigned from her job abruptly, a White House official and another person familiar with the situation told NBC News late Thursday night.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Why legal expert finds inspector general's message remarkable
articles.description: According an Office of the Inspector General report released Thursday, former FBI director James Comey violated policy by leaking memos, but DOJ will decline to prosecute. Benjamin Wittes of Lawfare joins Morning Joe to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'It has the name Stephen Miller written all over it'
articles.description: The Trump administration is now rejecting requests to defer deportations, including for severely sick migrants, and some 2020 Democratic candidates are publicly criticizing the president for the move.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Joe: Trump had contempt for Puerto Rico but interest in Florida
articles.description: Hurricane Dorian has strengthened, and it could hit Florida as a Category 4 storm. Meteorologist Bonnie Schneider has the latest updates, and the panel discusses President Trump's reaction to news Dorian is approaching Florida.
